MAP.COMMENT: get server memory usage in percent

Values.value: IS Memory utilization is %usedMem%% - Exceeds threshold limit - Starting Garbage Collection
IS Memory utilization is %usedMem%% - Under Threshold Limit - Stopping Garbage Collector
GC execution did not bring the memory utilization down
GC execution is success and memory utilization is under threshold limit
Memory Utilization is under threshold limit
Memory scan service execution failed with error: %lastError/error% Service: %lastError/callStack[0]/service%
